title: Enhancing Service Quality Practical Competencies: Learning Concentration Analysis Using Eye-Tracking Technology in Online Lectures

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of eye-tracking technology (EMME) and compare its differences from conventional mouse cursors.
Learners can practice enhancing learning concentration by applying gaze modeling techniques to real lecture scenarios.
Learners can propose at least three strategies for guiding learner attention when producing video lectures using eye-tracking technology.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
